yes.title: We hear you!
yes.description: Thank you for your confirmation. We are resolving your ticket.

no.title: We hear you!
no.description: We're sorry to hear that your payment issue was not resolved. We have raised a dispute and we are looking into this urgently. Note that disputes usually take 5-15 days to process.

no-p2p.title: We hear you!
no-p2p.description: We're sorry to hear that your payment issue was not resolved. You will receive another email from us, please respond to that email with a copy of your beneficiary's statement. We need this to raise a dispute on your behalf.

already-recorded.title: We've heard you
already-recorded.description: Your response has already been recorded before. If you want to change your earlier response, get in touch with Fi care.

invalid.title: Sorry, your response could not be recorded!
invalid.description: Sorry, you responded too late to this email. If your issue is still unresolved, chat with our Fi care team, and we'll sort things out on priority.

error.title: Sorry, we could not record your response
error.description: Something went wrong at our end. Please try again or get in touch with our Fi Care team so we can assist you better.
